title: Holoxin Over The Toilet Storage Shelf for Bathroom Organization Space Saver Organizer Rack White
features: Material: This shelf made of steel with white powder coated finish.
Easy to Instal: One-piece design, do no need any tools to assemble. You just need to use 2pcs adhesive clip sheet to fix the shelf on the toilet.

Product Feature: The mesh grid design allows air circulation and reduces dust build-up, ensures breathable and no odor and no more stagnant water or mildew growing, to keep toilet paper clean and dry.
Space Saver: A good choice for saving the bathroom space and bathroom organization.
description: 1. One-piece design, no need to assemble, easy to install. 2. The empty basket design is suitable for wet bathroom environment. 3. Paint design, rust-proof and beautiful. 4. Size, 13.38"*6.49"*5.9" 5. The high-lift design does not block the flush button, suitable for all toilets. 6. It is also a good choice to put it on the washing machine, to store detergent and other cleaning supplies
